Reviews.Title: Be certain of the model you order
Reviews.Author: Dan McNamara
Reviews.Content: After many comparisons of the different inspection cameras on the market I ordered the Whistler 2409C. What I missed was that not all Whistler inspection cameras that look the same in the ads have the ability to record to an SD card. No wonder the seller had the lowest price. This one has no SD slot. Be sure to check this feature before ordering. Also, the focus depth of field is very narrow. No way to focus this camera on the subject in "view". Still, for the low cost it's a good entry level, non-pro camera for the average user.

Reviews.Title: Whistler Inspection Device
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: The product works exceptionally well.  With Blue-Tooth transmission of the image captured by the probe, your assistant can view what is being photographed by the probe or, alternatively, you can leave the Monitor attached to the probe's handle and view the picture yourself.With variable control of light intensity, the camera can be controlled to provide the best view of the environment in which it is being employed.

Reviews.Title: Good unit for price.
Reviews.Author: Keith Jones
Reviews.Content: It has a color screen.  You must charge the screen overnight before first use.  4 AAs go in the handle.  I used the Whistler WIC2409C all day.  The screen has contrast, brightness and orientation buttons.  The orientation button is very useful because as you twist around with the camera your image may turn upside down.  This button sets the image back right side up.  The color screen is also detachable and works wirelessly.  This screen is very convenient because you can lay it anywhere while you shove the WIC2409C inspection cable into an inaccessible area.  Also, this screen has a video-out port, which I connected to a 19" computer screen.  But all I needed was the detachable screen with wireless connection.  Finally, this inspection camera has four small LEDs on the tip.  But for behind walls these small LEDs are like a small flashlight in an underground cave.  Therefore, I taped a mini LED flashlight on the camera end with electrical tape.  Then I turned the mini flashlight on and fed the camera into my cieling.  I had more than enough light and could see around 10 feet between the joists of my cieling.

Reviews.Title: Whistler WHIWIC2409C Wireless Inspection Device Whistler
Reviews.Author: Dennis W. Sitherwood "maintone"
Reviews.Content: This item was exactly was I was looking for, and at a very good price for the functions that it has.

Reviews.Title: Camera Snake
Reviews.Author: Daniel O. Bazan
Reviews.Content: Great device for the price, lighting and screen resolution can be better.  Moving parts on the tip of the cameras (mirror) can be mounted better.  Overall it gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Garth T. Elliott "Mastercastergarth"
Reviews.Content: Great features for the price, easily extendable and use it for a varity of problems. Keep it charged do not kink!

Reviews.Title: When is a Camera not a Camera?
Reviews.Author: Not so Happy
Reviews.Content: The discription of Camera implies this unit will capture a picture, This unit will not take pictures or video it is just a monitor that you can plug into another recording device.There is no usb port or sd card port, so if you dont want a picture from your camera then this is the unit for you, personally I would want to have the option of taking pictures and or video with a camera.Amazon return policy is great, sent it back unopened and orederd a Autel MV201-55 from them instead, it records pictures and video, has a mini usb port, sd card and has a smaller camera head at 5.5 mm. that will fit in the smallest of spark plug holes.True is does not have a remote wireless screen and cost a little more but at least it fits for my needs for a work inspection Camera that takes pictures.

Reviews.Title: Broke in two days
Reviews.Author: H. Im "Toollover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tool at Costco. Used just once and it broke the next day. It broke in just two days. Video won't apprear any more. While I am certain I can try this same model more and Costco will accept my returns as far as I need, I decided to save my trips to Costco. I am returning it now.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.4-inch LCD display
Detachable wireless color monitor offers full image control & TV/Video output jack
3 ft. flexible camera tube provides easy to reach beyond arm's length
9mm waterproof aluminum camera head
Includes mirror; magnet; and hook clip
ProductInfo.Name: Whistler WHIWIC2409C Wireless Inspection Device
